Headline: Padraic Driscoll
Article_Body: Padraic Driscoll is a four-time Emmy Award winner and Art Director for CNN Digital. Formerly with the NHL's Pittsburgh Penguins, his experience also includes in-house, agency, and freelance work for brands such as Time Warner Cable, Merck, Goya Foods, and Scholastic.  A native of upstate New York and a magna cum laude graduate of University of Pittsburgh, Padraic is classically trained in visual arts and art history. As a resident of New York City, Padraic studied at New York University and School of Visual Arts. In 2012, he was accepted to Swedish design school Hyper Island before changing course and relocating to Pittsburgh PA, ultimately returning to New York City to join CNN in 2016.
